62//
63#define AM_REG_STIMER_COMPARE(n, r) (CTIMERADDRn(CTIMER, n, SCMPR0) + \
64 (r * (offsetof(CTIMER_Type, SCMPR1) - offsetof(CTIMER_Type, SCMPR0))))
65
67#define AM_REG_STIMER_CAPTURE(n, r) (CTIMERADDRn(CTIMER, n, SCAPT0) + \
68 (r * (offsetof(CTIMER_Type, SCAPT1) - offsetof(CTIMER_Type, SCAPT0))))
69
71#define AM_REG_STIMER_NVRAM(n, r) (CTIMERADDRn(CTIMER, n, SNVR0) + \
72 (r * (offsetof(CTIMER_Type, SNVR1) - offsetof(CTIMER_Type, SNVR0))))
73
